attributes.review: this app is showing graphic photos of the garage person we have of a president, it showed pictures of all the women and children he sexually assaulted, harassed, and raped, maybe even molested, it showed me his daughters and sons and the one he wants to sleep with, his wife that cant even hold his hand, and his grandchildren who i am personally sorry for, why would you want that related to you. I FEEL ASHAMED TO BE AN AMERICAN 😔, no one should vote this year
attributes.title: the more im on this app the more i hate it

attributes.review: opened the app and right away i saw a picture of some sort of big orange pig man😭😱. it was terrifying😰😰 i was so scared i threw my phone across the room and it landed in my sink. i was in such a hurry to retrieve my phone that i slipped and fell on an old banana and turned on the tap!!! my phone is ruined and i’m currently typing this on my DS lite😖 i am so scared but atleast my phone is soaked so i’ll never have to see a picture of that spooky oompa loompa thing ever again😌
attributes.title: scarred for life😔😔

attributes.review:
My hispanic mother did not aprove seeing this app on my phone and i agree with her 150%. She is absolutely right and for that this app should go! Obviously those 5 star reviews are bots trying to trick you into getting the app so I am here to WARN you to not get it or you will also get grounded😔If you like this app you need to seek help ASAP!!! This is unbelievable. STOP IT NOW!
Have a great day everyone! STAY SAFE AND KEEP YOUR DISTANCE (even from this app) :)
attributes.title: This app got me grounded for 2 weeks!!! 😡

attributes.review: Not funny didn’t laugh, I opened the app and was extremely disgusted. I could not control the absolute nausea I immediately felt. My pet chicken asked if I was okay and I showed him the app and he burst into flames. This is not the type of content that I want shown to anyone especially our feathered friends. My phone ended up flying away after glitching and morphing into my now reincarnated pet chicken. I am truly heartbroken. To the unfortunate souls who download this app, DONT!
attributes.title: Ooga Booga👁👄👁

attributes.review: First, I open the app only to see a giant pig looking spiders. Now my phone has a virus! Don’t download unless you want a garbage phone. Second the quality is horrible. People need to change there game! 🤮🤮🤮 also when I try to exit out I always see trump leaked picture.  I see little 🕷 on my phone because of this app. And once downloaded it’s super hard to delete. Please fix this mess.  🧚🏽‍♂️ 💫 What a disgrace 🧚🏽
attributes.title: This utterly a disgrace

attributes.review: I open the app to see the one and only BuNKeR bOy MaN ChEEtO working out?!?! 🤮then it gave my phone a virus and the app didn’t do anything abt it how rude instead the app SHUT DOWN MY PHONE and went DARK WTH then the virus got through my wifi so all my electronics don’t work I HAVE TO WORK worst experience ever and oh I almost forgot it was so offensive to my non bianary vegan non dairy Hindi self why would a person say such a thing I’m so disappointed in this app like I am w this president
attributes.title: disgusting🤮🤮

attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw this dollar store Chester the cheetah creature staying right at me. I should’ve deleted the app after seeing this but I idiotically went through the app. The material I saw was absolutely atrocious and is brainwashing very gullible people into supporting that creature. And don’t get me started on the language used. It was absolutely belligerent and threatening I was scared for my life but didn’t want to alert the authorities cuz you know #acab. DONT DOWNLOAD ❌❌😤
attributes.title: Brainwashing and belligerent

attributes.review: This app truly had me flabbergasted as I read the amounts of hate speech. There were racist comments, misogynistic comments, homophobic comments for all of the LGBTQ+ community, as well as multiple people claiming they were christians which can simply just not be true if they are spreading hate and hating others in general. I am disgusted with this app and everything about it. I encourage all to delete this app and start respecting others and spreading positivity. Biden 2020
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: i downloaded this as a 134 year old monkey and instantly Cheetos started popping up all over my house and my phone started to glitch and there’s a pervert that shows up on almost every part of the app with some horrible orange fave i literally have no idea who that is and my dog won’t stop barking because of the app and i can’t sleep and it’s honestly the worst app to ever exist i don’t know how it is still on the app store 😦😬😮🥱🤫🤖👻🦾👛🥻👑🐴🙈🐗🙉🦅
attributes.title: disgusting app

attributes.review: So I downloaded the app with go intentions and right when I open the app “our president “ nude was right in the screen , it was so horrible not only that but my nieces and nephews where right there with me so they saw everything , then it continued to glitch which  made my phone freeze I totally do not recommend this app to anyone 🙅🏽‍♀️ you should definitely rethink your choice in getting this horrible manipulating app 🤮
attributes.title: Worse app ever
